annotations:
FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 21-08-2024 16:44:35   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17725611
ATTN CHARTERING DESKDEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL
MV. AKIJ GLOBE ABT 53,125 MT DWT ON 12.30 M, OPEN Kosichang, Thailand 28 AUGUST-1 SEPTEMBER 2024.
BOD VLSFO ABT 380 MT & LSMGO ABT 30 MT.
MV. AKIJ GLOBE
DWT: 53,125 MT ON 12.30 M DRAFT
TYPE OF VESSEL: SINGLE DECK GEARED BULK CARRIER
I.M.O. NO: 9293105, CALL SIGN: S2AE5
BUILT/ BUILDER: 2003/JAPAN
FLAG/ REGISTRY/ CLASS: BD/CHATTOGRAM/BV
P & I CLUB: SKULD
LOA / LBP: 189.94 / 182.00 M
BEAM / DEPTH: 32.26 M / 17.30 M
GRT / NRT: 30,000 / 18,467
T.P.C ON SUMMER DRAFT: 55.30/CM
HOLD CUBIC (PRELIMINARY) GRAIN/BALE: 68,927.4 M3 / 66786.5 M3
HATCH COVER: ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC DRIVEN HATCH COVER, FOLDING TYPE FORE/AFT.
HATCH COVER LENGTH BREADTH: NO.1-5: 17.6 M X 21.12 M.
HATCH COVER STRENGTH: NO.1: 2.08 MT/M2, NO.2-5: 1.75 MT/M2.
HOLD NO. LENGTH BREADTH EXTREME: NO.1: 29.0 M X 4.0 M FORE & 32.0 M AFT, NO.2-5: 29.92 M X 32.0 M
TANK TOP STRENGTH: NO.1: 21.44 MT/M2, 2 & 4: 18.00 MT/M2 & 3: 24.18 MT/M2, NO.5: 21.08 MT/M2
CRANES: 4 X ABT. 30.5 MT X 26 M RADIUS – OUTREACH FROM SHIPRAIL 9.87 M UNDER NORMAL WORKING CONDITION.
GRABS: THE VESSEL FITTED WITH 4 UNITS OF X 12.0 M3 GRABS (MAX PERMITTED DENSITY 2.3 TON/M3). FOR HEAVY CARGOES, MASTER SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO REMOVE SPILL PLATE OF GRAB TO REDUCE VOLUME. GEARS/GRABS NOT TO BE USED UNLESS EXPRESSIVELY SPECIFIED IN CP. FOR GRAIN, FERTILIZER, SUGAR AND SIMILAR TYPE CARGO MINOR LEAKAGE ACCEPTABLE).
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION AT SEA: BALLAST ABT 13.50 KTS AND LADEN ABT 13.00 KTS ON ABT 27.50 MT VLSFO 380 CST ABT & 0.1 MT LSMGO FOR ME & AE.
ECO SPEED & CONSUMPTION AT SEA: BALLAST ABT 13.00 KTS AND LADEN ABT 12.00 KTS ON ABT 23.50 MT VLSFO 380 CST & 0.1 MT LSMGO FOR ME & AE.
IN PORT WORKING: ABT 4.20 MT VLSFO 380 CST & ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO & IDLE ABT 2.80 MT VLSFO 380CST & ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
VLSFO 380 RMG & LSMGO IN STRICT ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010(E). NO MIXING OF BUNKERS ALLOWED UNLESS CONFIRMED ACCEPTABLE BY THE MASTER.
VESSEL HAS THE LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO FOR THE MAIN ENGINE WHEN SECA, ECA, MANEUVERING IN/OUT OF PORTS, CANALS, RIVERS, RESTRICTED AREAS, SHALLOW & NARROW WATERS, FOR STARTING UP/TURNING ENGINES, BURNING SLUDGE AND IN ADVERSE WEATHER, BAD/COLD WEATHER, HOLD CLEANING AND BILGE PUMPING. MASTER HAS THE AUTHORITY TO DIVERT COURSE FOR SMOOTH RUNNING/SAFETY OF THE VESSEL. SPEED AND CONSUMPTION FIGURES IN FAIR WEATHER WITHOUT ADVERSE CURRENT, EVEN KEEL, POOR VISIBILITY, CONGESTION, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL UP TO BEAUFORT SCALE FORCE 4 / DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 / WAVE AND SWELL COMBINED HEIGHTS UPTO 1.25 M. ABOUT ON SPEED AND CONSUMPTION CLARIFIED AS MEANING 5% ALLOWANCE ON CONSUMPTION AND 0.5 KNOTS ON SPEED, BOTH IN OWNERS FAVOR.
ALL DETAILS ABT/WOG.
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
Tonnage Desk:
PG-WCI-Rsea-Safr: Nitin Sharma | Mob: +91 9311255654  | Skype: mailto:acpl.nithin@outlook.com
ECI-Seasia: Carlton Carlo | Mob: +91 9311255657  | Skype: cid.971bb208b4e2c3bb
Seasia-FarEast: Arjun Chaudhary | Mob: +91 9311255656 | Skype: live:.cid.d66bb9d9c752a104
AS BROKERS ONLY
As Agents for Core Shipping Ltd.
